sections.original: I got the key to open all the gates I see
sections.spanish: Tengo la llave para abrir todas las puertas que veo

sections.original: I want this power inside of me
sections.spanish: Quiero este poder dentro de mí

sections.original: Try to destroy all what you feel inside
sections.spanish: Intenta destruir todo lo que sientes dentro

sections.original: Want you give me a part?
Let me say you're truly raspy
sections.spanish: Déjame decir que tienes una voz rasposa

sections.original: but I'm living to discover your soul
sections.spanish: pero vivo para descubrir tu alma
Vive de una forma más difícil

sections.original: Want you give me a part?
Let me say you're truly raspy
sections.spanish: Déjame decir que tienes una voz rasposa

sections.original: but I'm living to discover your soul
sections.spanish: pero vivo para descubrir tu alma

sections.original: And I know you're scared about the life that comes
sections.spanish: Y sé que tienes miedo de la vida que viene

sections.original: (Look in the mirror the fear is a part of you)
sections.spanish: (Mira al espejo: el miedo es parte de ti)

sections.original: I'll help you to choose the way
sections.spanish: Te ayudaré a elegir el camino

sections.original: Shot in his eyes, a silver sky,
sections.spanish: Le disparé en los ojos, un cielo plateado,

sections.original: his blood is in my hands (in my hands)
sections.spanish: su sangre está en mis manos (en mis manos)

sections.original: I blessed this one, I know he's died
sections.spanish: Bendije a este, sé que ha muerto

sections.original: But now I'm feeling so strange
sections.spanish: Pero ahora me siento tan extraño

sections.original: I don't want to be you guide
But stay with me and think for a while
sections.spanish: Pero quédate conmigo y piensa un momento

sections.original: The secret belong to a part of me
sections.spanish: El secreto pertenece a una parte de mí

sections.original: And it's my anger and my pain
sections.spanish: Y es mi rabia y mi dolor

sections.original: Just close my eyes and live your life
sections.spanish: Solo cierro mis ojos y vive tu vida

sections.original: Your tears are so sweet for me
sections.spanish: Tus lágrimas son tan dulces para mí

sections.original: I can't understand this joy inside of me
sections.spanish: No puedo entender esta alegría dentro de mí

sections.original: You can't understand me or ever justify
sections.spanish: Tú no puedes entenderme ni justificarlo jamás

sections.original: I just cannot be your guide
sections.spanish: Simplemente no puedo ser tu guía

sections.original: Just stay with me and think for a while
sections.spanish: Sigue conmigo y piensa un momento

sections.original: The secret belong to a part of me
sections.spanish: El secreto pertenece a una parte de mí

sections.original: Increase my anger and my pain
sections.spanish: Aumenta mi rabia y mi dolor

sections.original: Just close my eyes and live your life
sections.spanish: Solo cierro mis ojos y vive tu vida

sections.original: Your tears are so sweet for me
sections.spanish: Tus lágrimas son tan dulces para mí

sections.original: I'll take you into another world
I'll bring your heart into another world
sections.spanish: Llevaré tu corazón a otro mundo

sections.original: The secret belong to a part of me
sections.spanish: El secreto pertenece a una parte de mí

sections.original: Increase my anger and my pain
sections.spanish: Aumenta mi rabia y mi dolor

sections.original: Just close my eyes and live your life
sections.spanish: Solo cierro mis ojos y vive tu vida

sections.original: Your tears are so sweet for me
sections.spanish: Tus lágrimas son tan dulces para mí

sections.original: I'll never find another way to be
sections.spanish: Nunca encontraré otra forma de ser

sections.original: And like an actor I do
In all the things you do
Believe in yourself and all your dreams come true
sections.spanish: Cree en ti y que todos tus sueños se hagan realidad

sections.original: You'll never find another way to be
sections.spanish: Nunca encontrarás otra forma de ser

sections.original: You'll never change the way to live your life
sections.spanish: Nunca cambiarás la manera de vivir tu vida

sections.original: I cannot write all my confessions
sections.spanish: No puedo escribir todas mis confesiones

sections.original: Believe in yourself I know this time you could
sections.spanish: Cree en ti mismo, sé que esta vez podrías

sections.original: You'll never find another way to be
sections.spanish: Nunca encontrarás otra forma de ser

sections.original: You'll never change the way to live your life
sections.spanish: Nunca cambiarás la manera de vivir tu vida

sections.original: Someone is trying to take my life away
I'm still standing here in front
Right now I'm one too many
It's hard to say you may believe it
sections.spanish: Es difícil de decir; puede que lo creas

sections.original: That everything I'll do for me
sections.spanish: Que todo lo que haga por mí

sections.original: Will be in the name of your lonely tear
sections.spanish: Será en nombre de tu lágrima solitaria

sections.original: What I should say and where I'll go tonight?
sections.spanish: qué debería decir y a dónde iré esta noche?

sections.original: I'll go between the sun and shining stars
sections.spanish: viajaré entre el sol y las estrellas brillantes

sections.original: I'll be there with you whenever you are
sections.spanish: estaré allí contigo dondequiera que estés

sections.original: Right now I'm one too many
That everything I'll do for me
sections.spanish: Que todo lo que haga por mí

sections.original: Will be in the name of your lonely tear
sections.spanish: Será en nombre de tu lágrima solitaria

sections.original: Deep in you heart so alone
sections.spanish: Profundamente en tu corazón, tan solo

sections.original: I'm crying and I now I know
sections.spanish: Estoy llorando y ahora lo sé

sections.original: I just want to be myself...myself
sections.spanish: Solo quiero ser yo mismo...mí mismo

sections.original: And now the beat inside of me
sections.spanish: Y ahora el latido dentro de mí

sections.original: Is a sort of a cold breeze and I've
sections.spanish: Es como una brisa fría y no tengo

sections.original: I know I live...but like a stone I'm falling down
sections.spanish: Sé que vivo...pero como una piedra me caigo

sections.original: Right now it's falling on me
sections.spanish: Ahora mismo está cayendo sobre mí

sections.original: Fly, I just want to fly
But I know I'm not the only one
sections.spanish: Pero sé que no soy el único

sections.original: I see that another day is gone
sections.spanish: Veo que otro día ha pasado

sections.original: Please be here when I arrive, don't die...please
sections.spanish: Por favor, estate aquí cuando llegue, no mueras...por favor

title.original: Un Fantasma Tra Noi (A Ghost Between Us)
